article: the democratic people 's republic of korea -lrb- dprk -rrb- will counter the united states and south korea with `` a more rapid and powerful advanced preemptive strike in the korean style , '' a senior dprk official said tuesday .
abstract: dprk warns of unk preemptive attack against u.s. s. korea
